result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Hearing on July 1, 2022 at 08:15 am.

01:12 PM Defendant Christine B Krumrei in court, in custody, with State Public Defender Law Intern Patrick Sicula.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Julian Marrufo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant qualifies for Public Defender Representation but an attorney has yet to be appointed as there is a conflict.  Public Defender Intern Patrick Sicula does not have any other information to provide the Court relating to the conflict.  The Court advises Intern Patrick Sicula that an attorney from the Public Defender's Office will need to be prepared for the hearing tomorrow.  The hearing shall remain as previously set.  Bail remains as fixed.
Status conference on June 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with ACE Hardware listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney.   Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Hearing scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 08:15 am.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
